overview: In the spring of 2018, the filmmaker Maria Petschnig befriended Marc who at that time was living in his car in Brooklyn for more than a year, while also holding a day job. Petschnig started to record his life and struggle, his thoughts, routines, etc. over the course of two years.
tagline: Alone in Motion. Living in A Jeep.
title: Uncomfortably Comfortable
